title: Vertex of Parabola
text: The maximum of a quadratic occurs at the vertex. The maximum is the y-coordinate of the vertex.

title: Calculating Maximum
text: To calculate the y-coordinate of the vertex, first find the x-coordinate of the vertex with the formula $$\frac{-b}{2} a$$.

title: Value of x-coordinate
text: What is the x-coordinate value calculated from the formula?

title: Maximum Value of Function
text: To find the y-coordinate associated with the x-coordinate of $$2$$ for the vertex, plug $$2$$ into the function.
